        <script><![CDATA[var WF_IncidentConditions = Class.create();
WF_IncidentConditions.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
//LGWH-21875-INC - Only Users with FSM Roles or Major Incident Manager can Create Work Orders
    canCreateWorkOrder: function() {
        var reqd_roles = gs.getProperty('wf.inc.create.workorder.roles').split(",");
        if ((current.state == '2' || current.state == '1') && gs.hasRole(reqd_roles) && !(current.category == 'technology processing' && current.subcategory == 'user complaint'))
            return true;
        else
            return false;
    },
	canViewWorkOrder: function() {
        var reqd_roles = gs.getProperty('wf.inc.view.workorder.roles').split(",");
        if ((current.state == '2' || current.state == '1') && gs.hasRole(reqd_roles) && !(current.category == 'technology processing' && current.subcategory == 'user complaint'))
            return true;
        else
            return false;
    },

    type: 'WF_IncidentConditions'
});]]></script>
